text:
May we please agree on even that?
Message 979 of 4024
If we can do this over the weekend, it really sets us up for success with Dr Brown I think. I’d love to start the next week with at least a shared
understanding of the things we have discussed, but you have never seen. Then we have some common ground. I am really trying to work with you in
a constructive and positive way to dispel FUD and focus on fact! Hope you see it that way too! Education cannot hurt us now.
Sent:02/02/2024 at 05:51 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/02/2024 at 06:02 PM)
Subject:Re: As We Discussed
Message 980 of 4024
The message back from your lawyer was I was aware of blink cameras ( I definitely was not) and had access to account..
Why you would point direction at my car makes no sense.
Explanation of accounts suddenly connecting after years of no connection is unbelievable.
You initially said you saw an alert and not a video of me returning. Story changed after now you know what Adrian saw.
You have not provided credentials to account where you viewed the video.
So an apology with lies is not an apology.
The video versus att and Xfinity’s are two different issues. The text you sent was very creepy.
I’m not going to debate this further.
Dr Brown will help sort out but to be clear my position is you illegally monitored us. That’s why RO and the communication protocols
Sent:02/02/2024 at 06:02 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/02/2024 at 06:07 PM)
Subject:Re: Gorgeous Day: Dad & AD
Message 981 of 4024
I just checked and for whatever reason prices dropped. I can get it for 1k per ticket which is a huge difference.
Lmk if I can pull trigger for boys and I.
Sent:02/02/2024 at 06:06 PM
From:Christine Moyer

Subject:Re: Spring Break/Cabo
